name: Mysterious Planet
description:
Mysterious Planet - A fascinating 3D puzzle game for logic and thinking! Your ship is forced to land on a mysterious planet due to lack of fuel. And now a mysterious and fascinating world filled with puzzles opens up before you!

In the game you will find many interesting levels and blocks that you have to destroy! Complete the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Find the necessary fuel supply and get off this planet. Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

Game Features:
- Many levels
- Convenient controls
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
